refactoringOperationDescriptor.name: Add Blue DOCTYPE - NISO JATS Publishing 1.1
refactoringOperationDescriptor.description: A DOCTYPE declaration is added with the FPI indicating the JATS 'Blue' (Publishing) 1.1 tag set. If you end up with a parser error from having two such declarations, remove or comment out your old one (Ctrl-Shift-Comma).
